desc: At Maple Tree Vintage, you can purchase all your Mineral, Chalk and Clay paint needs to get your home project looking amazing. We also sell one-of-a-kind, customised furniture that has been designed and painted here at our beautiful property in Merrimu, Victoria.

layout.text: Hand Painted & Custom Designed Furniture, Home Décor & proud stockist of Fusion Mineral Paints, Made By Paint products, Hokus Pokus, Redesign and much more.
